title: Contemplative Lady
notes: Special guest John Thamm (Bob Ross's former instructor)

title: Waterfall Wonder
notes: Footage with Grand Ole Opry regular Hank Snow and announcer Grant Turner

title: Fisherman's Trail
notes: - After painting the canvas to resemble wood, Ross paints a landscape with the titular trail, plus mountains, trees, water, and shrubbery, but no sky.
